hero.title: Simplify scheduling with <highlight>Booqly</highlight>

hero.imageAlt: Small business owner using the Booqly dashboard

subscriptions.title: Flexible Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: Choose a plan that fits your business - from individual professionals to growing teams.

setup.title: Effortless Setup
setup.description: Add your services, team members, and booking rules in minutes - no tech skills required.

bento.title: Instant Bento Page
bento.description: Generate a beautiful, ready-to-share booking page that reflects your brand and style.

widget.title: Website Widget
widget.description: Embed the Booqly widget on your site and let clients book directly without leaving your page.

calendar.title: Google Calendar Sync
calendar.description: Automatically connect and sync your Google Calendar to prevent double bookings and keep everything updated.

automation.title: Automated Booking Flow
automation.description: Enjoy a fully automated, organic flow - clients can book anytime while you stay focused on what matters.

brandedPage.title: Launch a booking site that mirrors your studio
brandedPage.subtitle: Spin up a conversion-ready page with services, staff profiles, testimonials, and before/after galleries in minutes.

list.services: Configure services, pricing, and durations the way you work
list.staff: Showcase staff expertise, availability, and individual calendars
list.socialProof: Display reviews and work examples to build trust fast

smartScheduling.title: Stay fully booked without the spreadsheet chaos
smartScheduling.subtitle: Booqly builds slots using staff workload, service length, buffers, and Google Calendar sync - so every appointment just fits.

list.autoSlots: Auto-generate slots that respect buffers and working hours
list.calendarSync: Two-way Google Calendar sync keeps your team aligned
list.reminders: Automatic reminders for clients and staff reduce no-shows

omnichannelWidget.title: Let clients book from any channel
omnichannelWidget.subtitle: Share a booking link or embed the widget on your site, socials, or messengers - the flow stays fast and localized.

list.widget: Drop-in widget for websites, landing pages, and link-in-bio
list.languages: Client experience available in English, Latvian, and Russian
list.flow: Friendly booking flow that confirms appointments in under a minute

operationalControl.title: Onboard quickly, export whenever you need

list.onboarding: Guided steps make setup quick for services and staff
list.updates: Adjust availability, pricing, and policies anytime
list.export: Export bookings and customer data to CSV in a click

cta.label: Early Access
cta.title: Stop losing bookings to DMs
cta.description: Booqly centralizes scheduling, reminders, and client experience so you can launch fast and stay organized.

about.title: Built for small European service teams
about.description: Booqly is the all-in-one booking platform helping salons and studios turn interest into confirmed visits. Configure services, staff, and social proof once - the system handles the rest.

onboarding.title: Onboard in minutes
onboarding.description: Add services, staff profiles, pricing, and publish instantly - no clunky tools to stitch together.

widget.title: Share & embed anywhere
widget.description: Use a single booking link or drop the widget into your site, socials, or messengers.

availability.title: Availability rules that fit you
availability.description: Set buffers, quiet hours, and staff schedules - Booqly updates slots automatically.

privacy.title: EU privacy & easy export
privacy.description: Localized experience in EN/LV/RU, GDPR-minded, and CSV export whenever you need it.
